data.actual_result: There is no Kick or Ban option. Now the only way to kick or ban someone on Android is via the Manage Members screen, which requires the Manage Member role
data.expected_result: Kick and Ban options should appear there, as these options were here in the old settings screen
data.short_description: Kick and Ban options are missing on the new user settings card introduced in Alpha 5.1.8
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have kick/ban pems - Go to Member list and click on any user to view its settings
